HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How does it work?
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION:
Finding your next favorite book has never been easier.
Follow these easy steps to start your reading adventure.

STEP_1.TITLE: Browse and Select
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Explore our vast collection of over 100,000 books. Use filters to find exactly what you're looking for.

STEP_2.TITLE: Borrow Instantly
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: Choose your rental period and finalize your reservation in seconds. No fees!

STEP_3.TITLE: Free Delivery
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: Your books arrive at your home within 2-3 business days, carefully packaged and ready to read.

STEP_4.TITLE: Return Easily
STEP_4.DESCRIPTION: Once finished, use our prepaid return label. Drop it off at any post office.
